# Extreme Networks ExtremeXOS Basic Configuration
# X460-G2 Switch

configure snmp sysname "exos-switch-01"

# VLAN Configuration
create vlan "Management" tag 10
create vlan "Data" tag 20
create vlan "Voice" tag 30
create vlan "Native" tag 100

# Configure VLAN IP addresses
configure vlan Management ipaddress 10.0.10.1/24
configure vlan Data ipaddress 10.0.20.1/24
configure vlan Voice ipaddress 10.0.30.1/24

# Remove ports from Default VLAN
configure vlan Default delete ports 1:1-1:48

# Add ports to VLANs
configure vlan Management add ports 1:1-1:4 untagged
configure vlan Data add ports 1:5-1:24 untagged
configure vlan Voice add ports 1:5-1:24 tagged
configure vlan Native add ports 1:25-1:48 untagged

# Enable VLANs
enable vlan Management
enable vlan Data
enable vlan Voice
enable vlan Native

# Port Configuration
configure ports 1:1-1:48 display-string "Access Port"
enable ports 1:1-1:48

# Jumbo Frames
enable jumbo-frame ports 1:49-1:52
configure ip-mtu 9000 vlan Data

# SNTP Configuration
configure sntp-client primary server 10.0.10.100 vr VR-Default
configure sntp-client secondary server 10.0.10.101 vr VR-Default
enable sntp-client

# Syslog Configuration
configure syslog add 10.0.10.200:514 vr VR-Default local0

# SSH Configuration
enable ssh2
disable telnet

# SNMP Configuration
configure snmp community "public" read-only
configure snmp community "private" read-write

# STP Configuration
configure stp default-encapsulation dot1d
enable stpd s0
